permanent; constant; fixed; usual; ordinary; rule (old); one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
постоянный; постоянный; фиксированный; обычный; обычный; правило (старое); одна из 64 гексаграмм Книги Перемен (䷟)

heisig_chinese_memo: The constant sunrises and sunsets give you a permanent state of mind as if this will go on for all of time, when actually the sun will explode one day when it's too old.
Ru_trainchinese: héng: (графема) постоянный; неизменный; недвижимый, устойчивый
Kanshudo_mnemonic: your heart (忄) extends (亙) to constancy
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Permanent is holding the same state over an infinite span of time.
humanum_full_description_en:
Inscriptions from the " heart " from " interactive ", " constant " is " Wataru newcomer word" and " interactive " shaped like missing for months, because the moon is missing most of the time, so as to lack constancy month . The original meaning is constant and eternal (Xu Hao). "Said Wen": "Permanence, constant. From the heart to the boat, to go up and down in the second of leisure. The heart is based on the boat, and the constant is also. 𠄨, the ancient text is constant from the moon. The "Poetry" says: "The eternity of the moon."" easy. "Heng Gua": "Heng, long time."

Xiaozhuan's " moon " is changed into a " boat " shape, see " Qian " and " Heng ".

Bronze writing is used as a person's name. Hengzhaqixin pot: "Hengzha (made) and (ancestor) Xin pot". Guodian Chu bamboo slips " gen " follow " outside " but not " month ", which is the same as the ancient text of "Shuowen".
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from the " heart " from " interactive ", " constant " is " Wataru newcomer word" and " interactive " shaped like missing for months, because the moon is missing most of the time, so as to lack constancy month . The original meaning is constant and eternal (Xu Hao).
humanum_full_description:
金文從「心」從「亙」，「恆」是「亙」的後起字，「亙」象缺月之形，因月亮大部分時間是缺的，故以缺月為恆常。本義是恆常、恆久(徐灝)。《說文》：「恆，常也。从心从舟，在二之閒上下。心以舟施，恆也。𠄨，古文恆从月。《詩》曰：『如月之恒。』」《易．恆卦》：「恆，久也。」

　　小篆「月」旁訛變為「舟」形，參見「亙」、「恒」。

　　金文用作人名。恆乍且辛壺：「恆乍(作)且(祖)辛壺」。郭店楚簡「亙」旁從「外」不從「月」，與《說文》古文形同。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「心」從「亙」，「恆」是「亙」的後起字，「亙」象缺月之形，因月亮大部分時間是缺的，故以缺月為恆常。本義是恆常、恆久(徐灝)。

English Definition: permanent; constant; fixed; usual; ordinary; rule (old); one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)

    • 亙 [ gèn ] through; to extend across; to, from

Meaning: permanent

Story: Permanent is holding the same state over an infinite span of time.
Kind: traditional

金文從「 心 」從「 亙 」，「 恆 」是「 亙 」的後起字，「 亙 」象缺月之形，因月亮大部分時間是缺的，故以缺月為恆常。本義是恆常、恆久(徐灝)。《說文》：「恆，常也。从心从舟，在二之閒上下。心以舟施，恆也。𠄨，古文恆从月。《詩》曰：『如月之恒。』」《易．恆卦》：「恆，久也。」 小篆「 月 」旁訛變為「 舟 」形，參見「 亙 」、「 恒 」。 金文用作人名。恆乍且辛壺：「恆乍(作)且(祖)辛壺」。郭店楚簡「 亙 」旁從「 外 」不從「 月 」，與《說文》古文形同。

The original meaning is constant and eternal (Xu Hao). "Said Wen": "Permanence, constant. From the heart to the boat, to go up and down in the second of leisure. The heart is based on the boat, and the constant is also. 𠄨, the ancient text is constant from the moon. The "Poetry" says: "The eternity of the moon."" easy. "Heng Gua": "Heng, long time." Xiaozhuan's " moon" is changed into a " boat" shape, see " Qian" and " Heng". Bronze writing is used as a person's name. Hengzhaqixin pot: "Hengzha (made) and (ancestor) Xin pot". Guodian Chu bamboo slips " gen" follow " outside" but not " month", which is the same as the ancient text of "Shuowen".

恆字的基本解释

恆
héng
同“恒”。

恆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［héng］
［《廣韻》胡登切，平登，匣。］
亦作“恒1”。
(1)长久；固定。
(2)恒心。
(3)寻常；普通。
(4)规律；法则。
(5)伦常。
(6)副词。经常；常常。
(7)副词。犹尝，曾。
(8)《易》卦名。六十四卦之一，巽下震上。
(9)山名。
(10)姓。春秋楚有恒思公。见《广韵·平登》。
[②]［gèng］
［《集韻》居鄧切，去隥，見。］
亦作“恒1”。亦作“恒2”。
(1)月上弦之貌。
(2)周遍。
(3)通“亘”。绵延；连续。

恆字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　恆； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页383第25
〔古文〕??【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?胡登切，音峘。【說文】常也。又卦名。【易·恆卦】恆，久也。　又【禮·月令】文繡有恆。【疏】恆，故也。必因循故法也。又【周禮·夏官·司弓矢】恆矢痺矢，用諸散射。【註】恆矢。安居之矢也。痺矢象焉。　又山名。【爾雅·釋山】恆山爲北嶽。【史記·夏本紀註】恆山在定州恆陽縣。【風俗通】北方恆山。恆者。常也。萬物伏藏于北方，有常也。　又州名，漢恆山郡，周武帝置恆州，因山名。　又姓。楚大夫恆惠公。　又去聲。【轉注古音】古鄧切，音亙。【詩·小雅】如月之恆。【註】恆，古鄧反。弦也。月上弦而就盈。亦作絚。　又徧也。【詩·大雅】恆之秬秠。【註】恆，古鄧反。徧種之也。◎按此字體製不一，《說文》《集韻》《六書統》《說文》長箋》《精蕰正譌》等書从月从舟，辨駁更改，或省或幷，恐屬臆斷。因去古已遠，大篆，小篆已多不合，而況隷楷乎。凡講字形處，槩不贅引。

恆字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
恆字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［héng］
["Guang Yun" Hu Dengqie, Ping Deng, Xia. ]
Also known as "Heng 1".
(1) Long-term; fixed.
(2) Perseverance.
(3) Ordinary; ordinary.
(4) Law; law.
(5) Lun Chang.
(6) Adverbs. Often
(7) Adverbs. Still taste, Zeng.
(8) The hexagram name of "Yi". One of the sixty-four hexagrams, Sunda trembles upwards.
(9) The name of the mountain.
(10) Last name. There is Hengsi Gong in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Guangyun·Pingdeng".
[②]［gèng］
["Ji Yun" in Dengqie, go to Wei, see you. ]
Also known as "Heng 1". Also known as "Heng 2".
(1) The appearance of the first quarter of the moon.
(2) Weekly.
(3) Through "gen". Stretch; continuous.

[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　 Heng; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 383 No. 25
〔古文〕?? 【Guang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Club】? Hu Dengqie, Yintong. [Said Wen] Chang Ye. Also hexagram name. [Easy·Heng Gua] Constant, long time.　[Ritual·Monthly Order] Wen embroidery is permanent. 【Sparse】Heng, so also. It must follow the old ways. Also 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Si Gong Shi】Hengya Biya, using various scattering. [Note] Hengya. The arrow of Anju also. Bi Ya Xiang Yan.　Also the name of the mountain. 【Erya·Shishan】Hengshan is Beiyue. [Historical Records · Xia Benji Note] Hengshan is in Hengyang County, Dingzhou. [Customs] Hengshan in the north. Constant. Often too. Everything is hidden in the north, and there is constant.　Also the name of the state, Han Hengshan County, Zhou Wudi set Hengzhou, because of the name of the mountain.　Another last name. Dr. Chu Heng Huigong.　Go again. [Transfer to ancient sound] Gu Dengqi, the sound is constant. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Like the eternal moon. [Note] Heng, Gu Deng countered. String also. The moon is surging at the beginning of the quarter. Also used as 絚.　 Again and again. 【Poetry·Daya】Heng Zhili. [Note] Heng, Gu Deng countered.
